ajxp_plugin.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Bootstrap Loader]
ajxp_plugin.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Core plugin for loading the framework. Do NOT disable this plugin!]

global_param.name: sysLegend
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set up application title and create a connexion identifier for the super-administrator user. Make sure to use a strong password, as this user will have full access to the server.]

global_param.name: APPLICATION_WELCOME
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Welcome Message]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[An additional message displayed at startup, on the splash screen and the login screen.]

global_param.name: ADMIN_USER_PASS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Admin Password]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use a strong password (more than 8 characters, complicated ones.]

global_param.name: StorageLegend
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[How the application configuration data will be stored (users, plugins, etc. not how your actual documents are managed). To get started rapidly, select No Database. To enable more advanced features, configure a database connection.]

global_param.name: db_type
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Database]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Database type (Sqlite3 is NOT recommended for production purpose.)]

global_param.name: AdvancedLegend
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Please review these technical parameters. Encoding and URI should be auto-detected, but please make sure they reflect your actual server configuration.]

global_param.name: ENCODING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Detected Encoding]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Please make sure to set the encoding corresponding to your server configuration, something like ln_LN.CHARSET, e.g en_US.UTF-8]

global_param.name: SERVER_URL
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Detected Server URL]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Make sure this is correct, as it's used to rewrite the htaccess file]

global_param.name: APC_CACHE_ENABLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable cache (recommended)]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use key/value store to cache server data in-memory. If APC/APCu is detected, it will be enabled by default, you can change this setting later to use a dedicated server like Redis or Memcache.]

global_param.name: MAILER_ENABLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable emails]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set up system to send emails]

global_param.name: MAILER_SYSTEM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Php Mailer]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Set up the correct value to send emails]

global_param.name: MAILER_ADMIN
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Administrator Email]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Default 'From' email used to send emails.]

global_param.name: TEST_MAILER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Test Mailer]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Try sending an email with the configured data]

global_param.name: APPLICATION_LANGUAGE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Default Language]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Select a language activated by default( users will still be able to switch)]
